title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
tor is revealed. If you want to free Prince Orpheus, accept Raphael's offer or simply steal the hammer from House of Hope. (Free Orpheus) Help Kith'rak Voss also gives you the best sword for Laezel. In Confront the Elder Brain, side with Prince Orpheus and defeat the Elder Brain, Lae'zel will follow the prince to fight queen Vlaakith.

The Githyanki Warrior All Outcomes and Results

Orpheus Becomes the Mind Flayer, then Asks to be Killed, And Lae'zel Leaves
